~~~~~~~STINGTRA~~~~~~

Stingtra: Fine, I'll stay but I'm going to the back =
of the base to do what I want and if anyone thinks about coming to get me t=
han tell them I want to be ALONE.

*Stingtra walks back in the base at a fa=
st pace and marches into the back of the base and sits in the back all alon=
e and sighs*

Stingtra: Hahaha....Alone...heeheehee...

*Stingtra mumbles t=
o herself*

*Stingtra looks around to see if anyone is looking*

*Stingtra =
opens her leg compartment and takes out a bottle. She takes a large gulp of=
 it and smiles*

Stingtra: No place like home.....

*Stingtra takes another=
 big gulp slides down into a laying position and continues to drink*
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: Talon Harvilicz 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 11:30 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

=

  Wildfire: 




  He's just another male, Wildfire said to Stingtra. But =
there is something I got from him when I scanned his mind about you. He's j=
ust confused. He's still wrapped up in his past.

  She nudged Stingtra's a=
rm. Now get back inside. The night is too wild.

  >Stingtra: I did thank you because I like Qui=
ckstrike but not his attitude. I like him alot but I better start thinking =
about someone else. it would work better if he liked me but I guess help sa=
ve him two times just isn't enough. He never thanks me and someone does for=
 anything I do. If I'm staying than I'm ignoring Quickstrike. I'm not doing=
 him anymore favors so he can give a damned angry look. 
  > 
  >*Stingtra =
says to Windfire*

  >

 you were fine with them a few megacycles ago. Even with Quickstrike. You e=
ven thanked me for helping him. Something you hardly hear from a Predacon. =
